info.name: Buhurt Fight Tracker
info.description:
API for indexing and cataloging Buhurt (medieval armored combat) fight videos.

## Overview

The Buhurt Fight Tracker provides a REST API to manage:
- **Countries** and **Teams** (organizational hierarchy)
- **Fighters** (individual combatants belonging to teams)
- **Fights** (recorded bouts with participants, dates, and outcomes)
- **Tags** (flexible categorization system for fights)

## Key Concepts

- All entities use **UUID** primary keys
- Deletions are **soft deletes** (records are flagged, not removed)
- Fights support two formats: **singles** (1v1) and **melee** (5v5+)
